on reading compounds: 切っ先【キッサキ】point (of a sword, etc.), pointed verbal attack
鋭鋒【エイホウ】brunt of attack or argument
兵鋒【ヘイホウ】the point of a sword, the advance of an army
kun reading compounds: 切っ先【きっさき】point (of a sword, etc.), pointed verbal attack
矛【ほこ】long-handled Chinese spear, lance, pike, weapon, arms, grip of a bow, parade float decorated with long-handled Chinese spears
矛先【ほこさき】point of spear, spearhead, brunt, aim of attack, force of argument
